name: Quest for Glory 4: Shadows of Darkness
name_original: Quest for Glory 4: Shadows of Darkness
description:
Quest for Glory 4: Shadows of Darkness is an adventure-RPG game developed by Sierra On-Line. It came out on 01-01-1993. Sierra On-Line published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Quest for Glory 4: Shadows of Darkness is available on PC.
